statements: SELECT * FROM business_KPIs
SELECT business_id, revenue, expenses FROM business_KPIs WHERE profit > 5000 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT business_id, expenses, revenue FROM business_KPIs WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-03-31'
SELECT SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue, SUM(expenses) AS total_expenses, SUM(profit) AS total_profit FROM business_KPIs
SELECT * FROM business_KPIs WHERE business_id = 1001
SELECT business_id, revenue, expenses, profit, date FROM business_KPIs WHERE business_id = 10 ORDER BY date DESC, profit ASC
SELECT SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue, SUM(expenses) AS total_expenses, SUM(profit) AS total_profit FROM business_KPIs GROUP BY business_id HAVING total_profit > 5000
SELECT * FROM business_KPIs WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY revenue DESC, expenses ASC
SELECT AVG(revenue) AS avg_revenue, AVG(expenses) AS avg_expenses, AVG(profit) AS avg_profit FROM business_KPIs
SELECT business_id, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM business_KPIs ORDER BY formatted_date
SELECT metric_name, calculation_formula FROM kpi_metrics;
SELECT * FROM kpi_results WHERE actual_value >= 100;
SELECT result_id, metric_id, date, actual_value FROM kpi_results ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT metric_name, target_value FROM kpi_metrics WHERE target_value > 50;
SELECT result_id, metric_name, result FROM kpi_results JOIN kpi_metrics ON kpi_results.metric_id = kpi_metrics.metric_id;
SELECT metric_id, metric_name, calculation_formula FROM kpi_metrics WHERE metric_id = 1
SELECT * FROM kpi_metrics WHERE metric_name LIKE 'Sales%'
SELECT metric_id, calculation_formula FROM kpi_metrics ORDER BY metric_id DESC
SELECT metric_name, MAX(target_value) AS max_target FROM kpi_metrics GROUP BY metric_name
SELECT * FROM kpi_results WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT * FROM KPI_Customers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT customer_name, city FROM KPI_Customers WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, sale_amount FROM KPI_Customers JOIN KPI_Sales ON KPI_Customers.customer_id = KPI_Sales.customer_id WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM KPI_Sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT expense_type, amount, expense_date FROM KPI_Expenses WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY expense_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, city, country FROM KPI_Customers;
SELECT * FROM KPI_Sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM KPI_Sales GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT expense_type, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM KPI_Expenses GROUP BY expense_type ORDER BY avg_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, city, country, sale_amount FROM KPI_Customers JOIN KPI_Sales ON KPI_Customers.customer_id = KPI_Sales.customer_id ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM kpi_statistics;
SELECT kpi_name, kpi_value FROM kpi_parameters WHERE parameter_name = 'Revenue';
SELECT kpi_name, target_value, target_date FROM kpi_targets ORDER BY target_date DESC;
SELECT result_date, result_value FROM kpi_results WHERE result_value > 100 ORDER BY result_date ASC;
SELECT id, kpi_name, kpi_value, time_period FROM kpi_statistics WHERE kpi_value < 500;
SELECT kpi_name, kpi_value FROM kpi_statistics WHERE kpi_name = 'Sales' AND time_period > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM kpi_parameters WHERE parameter_name = 'Conversion Rate';
SELECT kpi_name, SUM(target_value) AS total_target_value FROM kpi_targets GROUP BY kpi_name;
SELECT result_date, AVG(result_value) AS avg_result_value FROM kpi_results GROUP BY result_date ORDER BY result_date DESC;
SELECT kpi_name, result_value FROM kpi_results WHERE result_value >= 100 ORDER BY result_value DESC, kpi_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM KPIs;
SELECT name, revenue, expenses FROM KPIs WHERE profit > 10000;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employees ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT metric_name, value FROM Metrics WHERE value BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT * FROM KPIs WHERE profit > expenses
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT employee_name, position, salary FROM Employees WHERE salary > 50000 AND department = 'Sales' ORDER BY employee_name
SELECT metric_name, value FROM Metrics WHERE value < 0
SELECT sale_date, product_id, quantity FROM Sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY sale_date ASC
